markdown:
<title level="1" right="Creature Family">[Elephant](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=413)</title>

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 150 <sup>1.1</sup>

Immediately recognizable by their long, prehensile trunks and impressive tusks, elephants have different characteristics depending on where they are found. Elephants are used as beasts of burden in many regions, but they are extremely clever and must be handled with great care.

<title level="2">Members</title>
[Elephant](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2993) (Creature 7), [Mammoth](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2994) (Creature 10)

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_5_TreasureAndRewards.png">Ivory</title>

Elephant tusks are a highly sought-after treasure, with the ivory from a single tusk potentially fetching hundreds of gold coins. Those who value the elephant's majestic presence are impassioned defenders of the creatures, making the hunt for ivory dangerous.
</aside>
name: Elephant
